_header: O blissful bird full of grace
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Salue regina / mater misericordie’ — six quatrains with Salue refrain and this burden

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
O blyssedfull berd full of graceTo all mankynd þou art
                    solas…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…Of þat we pray þe þat we not
                    mysSalue
